+- #document[]
   +- #declaration[@Name = "xml"]
   +- #text[@Image = " ", @NormalizedText = " ", @Text = "
"]
   +- root[]
   |  +- #text[@Image = " ", @NormalizedText = " ", @Text = "
  "]
   |  +- child[@attr1 = "value1"]
   |  |  +- #text[@Image = "text & entities", @NormalizedText = "text & entities", @Text = "text & entities"]
   |  +- #text[@Image = " ", @NormalizedText = " ", @Text = "
"]
   +- #text[@Image = " ", @NormalizedText = " ", @Text = "
"]
